titleStmt.title: A declaration of former passages and proceedings betwixt the English and the Narrowgansets, with their confederates wherein the grounds and justice of the ensuing warre are opened and cleared.
titleStmt.author: Winthrop, John, 1588-1649.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to John Winthrop. cf. NUC pre-1956.
